parrafo.p: I'm a systems engineer specializes in creating (and occasionally designing) exceptional

about.p1: Hello! My name is Edson Meza. I love developing applications that live on the internet.
about.p2: My interest in web development started in 2021, when I decided to enter the world of programming.
about.p3: My main focus these days is to create accessible, exceptional and inclusive products for a variety of clients.
about.p4: Here are some technologies I've been working on recently:

div_1.p: Web application for virtual stores, with user registration functionality, registration and promotion of products for customers.

div_2.p: Website that searches for a Pokémon by name or using its National Pokédex number.

div_3.p: Web application that can register a user and post a Stories, images and make comments on the posts of other users.

contact.p: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or need my help.

footer: Designed and built by Edson Meza
